codes.INSUFFICIENT_POINTS: Insufficient points. Please top up and try again.
codes.NO_SUCCESS_PROXY: No available proxy (status is OK). Please check/add proxies and retry.
codes.PROXY_NOT_SUCCESS: Selected proxy is unavailable. Please choose a working proxy.
codes.TIMEOUT: Cloud transcription is still running. Please refresh and try again later.
codes.D1_BINDING_MISSING: Cloudflare D1 binding not found. Please check your Wrangler config.
codes.D1_SCHEMA_NOT_READY: Cloudflare D1 database is not initialized. Run migrations and retry.
codes.PROVIDER_MISMATCH_FOR_MODEL_PRICING_RULE: Provider mismatch for model pricing rule.
codes.LLM_PRICING_RULE_UNIT_MUST_BE_TOKEN: LLM pricing rule unit must be token.
codes.LLM_PRICING_RULES_REQUIRE_INPUT_AND_OUTP: LLM pricing rules require both input and output price per unit.
codes.WHISPER_API_PROVIDERS_REQUIRE_BASE_URL: Whisper API providers require a baseUrl.
codes.METADATA_MAX_UPLOAD_BYTES_MUST_BE_POSITI: metadata.maxUploadBytes must be a positive number.
codes.CANNOT_DELETE_PROVIDER_MODELS_STILL_REFE: Cannot delete provider: models still reference it.
codes.WHISPER_API_BASE_URL_NOT_CONFIGURED: Whisper API baseUrl is not configured for this provider.
codes.WHISPER_API_TOKEN_NOT_CONFIGURED: Whisper API token is not configured for this provider.
codes.NO_ENABLED_LLM_MODEL_FOR_PROVIDER: No enabled LLM model found for this provider.
codes.NO_COMMENTS_FOUND_FOR_MEDIA: No comments found for this media.
codes.SOURCE_VIDEO_NOT_FOUND_IN_CLOUD_STORAGE: Source video not found in cloud storage. Re-run cloud download and retry.
codes.FAILED_TO_PREPARE_COMMENTS_METADATA: Failed to prepare comments metadata for cloud render.
codes.FAILED_TO_CREATE_MEDIA_RECORD_FOR_DOWNLO: Failed to create media record for download.
codes.MEDIA_URL_MISSING_CANNOT_REFRESH_METADAT: Media URL is missing; cannot refresh metadata.
codes.THREAD_TEMPLATE_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: A template with the same name already exists.
codes.UPLOADED_AUDIO_NOT_FOUND_IN_STORAGE_YET: Uploaded audio not found in storage yet.
codes.AUDIO_ASSET_NOT_READY_YET: Audio asset is not ready yet.
codes.THREAD_TEMPLATE_CONFIG_OBJECT_REQUIRED: templateConfig must be an object with version: 1 (v1 only).

pointsPricing.title: Points Pricing
pointsPricing.subtitle: Manage pricing rules for LLM, ASR, and downloads. Total rules: {total}

matrix.title: Pricing Matrix
matrix.subtitle: Set prices per model; models without overrides inherit the default rule.

form.modelIdHint: Leave empty for the default rule for this resource.
form.overrideHint: Hint: this model has no override yet; saving will create a model override rule.
form.llmPricingHint: LLM prices are stored as µpoints/token. 1 point = 1,000,000 µpoints. With 10 RMB = 1000 points, RMB per 1M tokens = µpoints/token ÷ 100 (e.g. 8 RMB/1M input tokens ⇒ 800 µpoints/token).

preview.title: Charge Preview
preview.roundingHint: Billed by rounding up to minutes.
preview.noRule: Missing default rule: usage will not be charged.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Video Genius Hub. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your data. By using our service, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We may collect the following types of information:

items.account: Account information: including your email address, nickname, and password (stored encrypted)
items.usage: Usage data: including your activity logs, service usage patterns, and preferences
items.device: Device information: including device type, operating system, browser type, and IP address
items.media: Media data: including metadata related to videos you upload or download

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

items.service: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.improve: To analyze usage patterns and optimize user experience
items.communicate: To send you service-related notifications and updates
items.security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.content: Your data is stored on secure cloud servers. We employ industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your information. We retain your data only for as long as necessary or as required by law.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances: with your consent; to comply with legal obligations; to protect our rights and safety; with trusted third-party service providers who help us operate our services (and who are bound by privacy protections).

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: Access the personal data we hold about you
items.delete: Request deletion of your data in certain circumstances
items.export: Request export of your data in a portable format

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized content. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings, but disabling certain cookies may affect service functionality.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. Significant changes will be communicated to you through in-service notifications or email.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the support channels within the platform.
